<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4536</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Television -- Conversation Topic</string>
            <string language="es">Televisión – Tema de conversación</string>
            <string language="ga">An Teilifís – Údar Comhrá</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fernsehen -- Gespräch Thema</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Télévision -- Sujet de Conversation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Televisão -- Tópico Da Conversação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Televisione -- Soggetto Di Conversazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τηλεόραση -- θέμα συνομιλίας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A list of vocabulary relevant to television and a suggestion for a class plan on how to get students talking about television programmes.</string>
            <string language="es">Una lista de vocabulario relacionado con la televisión y una sugerencia para un plan de clase sobre cómo hacer que los estudiantes hablen de programas de televisión.</string>
            <string language="ga">Liosta foclóra atá bainteach leis an teilifís agus moladh ar phlean ranga chun daltaí a chur chun cainta faoi chláir theilifíse.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Spanish</string>
            <string language="es">Español. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Spáinnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Liste des Wortschatzes relevant zum 
Fernsehen und ein Vorschlag für eine Kategorie planen auf, wie man 
die Kursteilnehmer erhält, die mit Fernsehenprogrammen sich befassen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une liste de vocabulaire concernant la 
télévision et une suggestion pour une classe projettent sur la 
façon dont obtenir des étudiants parlant des émissions 
télévisées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma lista do vocabulário relevante à televisão
e uma sugestão para uma classe planeiam em como começar os 
estudantes que falam sobre programas da televisão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una lista di vocabolario relativa alla 
televisione e un suggerimento per un codice categoria progettano su 
come ottenere gli allievi che parlano dei programmi televisivi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας κατάλογος λεξιλογίου σχετικός με την τηλεόραση 
και μια πρόταση για μια κλάση προγραμματίζουν στο πώς να πάρουν 
τους σπουδαστές μιλώντας για τα τηλεοπτικά προγράμματα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spanisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Espagnol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espanhol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spagnolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισπανικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
